rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry hall with natural light through sidelights; acts as a transitional space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living room oriented towards the east for abundant morning light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; designed with a Chettinad aesthetic using locally sourced materials.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and ventilated design with natural light through large windows; includes storage and prep area.

rooms.name: Utility/Storage Room
rooms.description: Essential for storing household items and cleaning supplies.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom with natural light considerations.

openings.description: Large door opening facilitating smooth flow between spaces.
East-facing window enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Open transition for a unified culinary experience.
South-facing window ensuring cross ventilation and daylight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony; positioned in the northeast sector for positive energy as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Dual-purpose room designed for two children; includes ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with natural ventilation via windows.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed for productivity; located in a quiet corner of the villa with west exposure to balance energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.description: Private entry ensuring seclusion and privacy.
South-facing window providing ample light for work and reducing eye strain.
Direct access to a shared corridor ensuring safety and ease of movement.

rooms.name: Studio/Rec Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional space for relaxation and recreational activities; designed with flexibility in mind.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Spares bedroom ensuring extra space for guests or extended family; oriented to maximize natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom attached to the guest bedroom with appropriate ventilation.

openings.description: Large panoramic window for natural lighting and enhanced air flow.
Provides easy access to the communal area while maintaining privacy.
